scenes.background: Bob crosses his arms and looks frustrated.
scenes.description: I just dont see us agreeing on anything at this rate.

options.text: Maybe we need to take a step back and reassess our options.
options.analysis: You suggested a calm and rational approach, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: I think we should stick to our original suggestions and vote.
options.analysis: You advocated for a democratic resolution, showing good self-regulation and motivation, but empathy and social skill were moderate.

options.text: If we can't agree, maybe we should just cancel the celebration.
options.analysis: You expressed frustration with the lack of consensus, showing good empathy and motivation, but social skill and perception were lower.
